meanings.sent1: The fungicidal spray effectively eliminated the mold on the walls.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use fungicidal treatments to protect their crops from fungal infections.
meanings.sent3: The mushrooms threw a party, but the fungicidal cleaner crashed it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a fungicidal ray of sunshine, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The fungicidal properties of the medication were evident in the rapid recovery of the plant.

meanings.sent1: She bought a bottle of fungicidal to get rid of the mold in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: The gardener applied fungicidal to the soil to prevent fungal growth.
meanings.sent3: The fungi held a funeral for their fallen comrade, the fungicidal spray.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as a fungicidal, eradicating doubts and fears from her mind.
meanings.sent5: The fungicidal worked its magic, restoring the health of the infected plants.
